channel.title: Kien's Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Kien's Personal Blog

item.title: Generating TPC-DS data into Google Cloud Storage
item.description: I build a container image to generate TPC-DS table data and upload them to Google Cloud Storage

item.title: Building a container image for Hive Metastore
item.description: I build a container image to run Hive Metastore “in the cloud”

item.title: Hello my blog
item.description: The older I get, the slower I learn and the worse my memory become. So I start this blog to keep track of stuffs I don’t want to forget, especially about programming and tech.
